column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I was long overdue for a haircut so I made an appointment for Saturday .
#text=When I arrived I had to sit and wait a few minutes for the stylist to escort me to the chair .
#text=I read a magazine while I waited .
#text=After the stylist greeted me she asked if I wanted the usual .
#text=I did , so we went straight to the shampoo area .
#text=She shampooed my hair and we made small talk about television shows we were watching .
#text=then we went back to the chair and she commenced cutting .
#text=After the cut she styled my hair with product and blow dried it for me .
#text=I asked to buy some of the product so she grabbed it and added it to my bill .
#text=when the haircut was done she walked me back to the counter where I paid and tipped her 20 percent .
